类 MarbleSolitaireModelImpl

java.lang.Object
MarbleSolitaireModelImpl
所有已实现的接口:
MarbleSolitaireModel
public class MarbleSolitaireModelImpl extends Object implements MarbleSolitaireModel
A class that represents a Marble Solitaire game object.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    MarbleSolitaireModelImpl()
    Default constructor for no input.
    MarbleSolitaireModelImpl(int armNum)
    Constructor that initialize a game board with the empty slot at the center.
    MarbleSolitaireModelImpl(int emptyRow, int emptyColumn)
    Constructor that initialize the game board so that the arm thickness is 3 and the empty slot is at the position (emptyRow, emptyColumn).
    MarbleSolitaireModelImpl(int armNum, int emptyRow, int emptyColumn)
    Fourth constructor that take the arm thickness, row and column.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • MarbleSolitaireModelImpl

      public MarbleSolitaireModelImpl()
      Default constructor for no input. Initialize the game board as arm thickness 3 with the empty slot at the center).

    • MarbleSolitaireModelImpl

      public MarbleSolitaireModelImpl(int emptyRow, int emptyColumn) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructor that initialize the game board so that the arm thickness is 3 and the empty slot is at the position (emptyRow, emptyColumn). If this specified position is invalid, it should throw an IllegalArgumentException.
      参数:
      emptyRow - given row number of the empty slot
      emptyColumn - given column number of the empty slot
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • MarbleSolitaireModelImpl

      public MarbleSolitaireModelImpl(int armNum) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructor that initialize a game board with the empty slot at the center. Throw an IllegalArgumentException if the arm thickness is not a positive odd number.
      参数:
      armNum - the given arm thickness
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • MarbleSolitaireModelImpl

      public MarbleSolitaireModelImpl(int armNum, int emptyRow, int emptyColumn) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Fourth constructor that take the arm thickness, row and column. It should initialize a game board with the given empty slot and given arm thickness. It should throw an IllegalArgumentException if the arm thickness is not a positive odd number, or the empty cell position is invalid.
      参数:
      armNum - the given arm thickness
      emptyRow - given row number of the empty slot
      emptyColumn - given column number of the empty slot
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException

  • 方法详细资料

    • move

      public void move(int fromRow, int fromCol, int toRow, int toCol) throws IllegalArgumentException
      从接口复制的说明: MarbleSolitaireModel
      Move a single marble from a given position to another given position. A move is valid only if the from and to positions are valid. Specific implementations may place additional constraints on the validity of a move.
      指定者:
      move 在接口中 MarbleSolitaireModel
      参数:
      fromRow - the row number of the position to be moved from (starts at 0)
      fromCol - the column number of the position to be moved from (starts at 0)
      toRow - the row number of the position to be moved to (starts at 0)
      toCol - the column number of the position to be moved to (starts at 0)
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the move is not possible

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      从接口复制的说明: MarbleSolitaireModel
      Determine and return if the game is over or not. A game is over if no more moves can be made.
      指定者:
      isGameOver 在接口中 MarbleSolitaireModel
      返回:
      true if the game is over, false otherwise

    • getGameState

      public String getGameState()
      从接口复制的说明: MarbleSolitaireModel
      Return a string that represents the current state of the board. The string should have one line per row of the game board. Each slot on the game board is a single character (O, _ or space for a marble, empty and invalid position respectively). Slots in a row should be separated by a space. Each row has no space before the first slot and after the last slot.
      指定者:
      getGameState 在接口中 MarbleSolitaireModel
      返回:
      the game state as a string

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      从接口复制的说明: MarbleSolitaireModel
      Return the number of marbles currently on the board.
      指定者:
      getScore 在接口中 MarbleSolitaireModel
      返回:
      the number of marbles currently on the board
